name: Painter Platformer
description:
Use your painting prowess to create platforms to get the key and leave through the rainbow door! Be careful though, when you grab the key, what was once a helpful platform is now your worst enemy!

Painter Platformer is a Puzzle Platformer game made for Minijam 111: Colors with the limitation of "You are your own Enemy". 

Instructions:

AD/Space or ArrowKeys to Move/Jump 

Grab the key to unlock the door

Enter the door to go to proceed to the next level

Right Click to enter Painting Mode

Mouse Wheel scroll to switch tools

Left click to activate tool

Tools only work on the "Canvas"

Green Square Tool places a Turtle Block you can stand on

Red Square Tool places a Dragon Block that ends you

Eraser Tool destroys any placed blocks

When you grab the key, you can 

no longer enter painting mode 

and all placed blocks will do the 

opposite of what they did before
